entries.title: George Santos' Ex-Boyfriend Says He Stole His Phone, Never Went to Work
entries.description: "I would be scared to have someone like that in charge — having so much power in his hands," Pedro Vilarva said about Santos.

entries.title: China Is Preparing for War, Retired General Warns
entries.description: "Xi Jinping has made it quite clear...that he is going to make, from his perspective, China whole again by subsuming Taiwan," H.R. McMaster said Sunday.

entries.title: Idaho Murders Suspect Bryan Kohberger's Family Make Statement
entries.description: Bryan Kohberger's family said they care deeply for the victims and will continue to love and support their son.

entries.title: Russia May 'Never Emerge' From Putin's Dark Forest: Former NATO Commander
entries.description: Retired U.S. Navy Admiral James Stavridis called a New Year's special on Russian state TV a "sad contrast" to other celebrations happening worldwide.

entries.title: Former FBI Official Explains How Agents Tracked, Surveilled Bryan Kohberger
entries.description: Kohberger's attorney said he plans to fight the charges against him, while law enforcement official said they are confident he was responsible for the murders.

entries.title: Fox News Host Confronts GOP Rep. Over Opposing Trump Tax Return Release
entries.description: "Why is it that President Trump, in your estimation, should be an exception to history?" the Fox News interviewer asked Texas Representative Kevin Brady.

entries.title: Mary Trump Says Racism Was the Norm in Trump Family
entries.description: "My parents didn't have any Black friends and everybody at my school practically was white. And it was just this weird cognitive dissonance," Mary Trump said.

entries.title: 'Kaleidoscope' Creator Weighs in on Leo's Fate and His Plans for Season 2

entries.title: Teacher Hacked to Death With Axe in Grisly Assault: Reports
entries.description: The New Year's Day incident reportedly occurred between a mathematics teacher and a school worker.

entries.title: Congressman Warns TikTok Is 'Digital Fentanyl' for These Two Reasons
entries.description: The Chinese social media platform is "highly addictive and destructive," Republican Representative Mike Gallagher said.

entries.title: Putin's Constant Coughing in NYE Address Spurs More Rumors About His Health
entries.description: The Russian president coughed frequently throughout his address, and appeared jittery to some.

entries.title: Former Prosecutor Says Trump Has Most Criminal Exposure in This Probe
entries.description: Attorney David Henderson said Sunday that one prosecutor isn't going to "back off" from the former president.

entries.title: Video Shows Person Rafting Through San Francisco's Severely Flooded Streets
entries.description: Different parts of California saw heavy rain, snow, and wind on Saturday, which caused flooding and landslides.

entries.title: Kari Lake Reveals What She Learned About Herself in 2022: 'The Right Thing'
entries.description: The Arizona Republican says she "handed my life over to God 100 percent" in 2022.

entries.title: Republican Governor Demands George Santos Face Accountability
entries.description: "That's unacceptable in politics. It breaches the trust between the electorate and their elected official," Arkansas Governor Asa Hutchinson said Sunday.

entries.title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Accuses Elise Stefanik of 'Embracing Neo-Nazism'
entries.description: The New York progressive tweeted a critique of Stefanik on Saturday in response to a New York Times article.

entries.title: Trump Faces 'Bad Year' in 2023, Likely to Face Charges: Former Prosecutor
entries.description: Jordan Rubin said Sunday that the former president's "name hasn't been synonymous with accountability," and that "there's reason to think that will change."

entries.title: Putin's NYE Address Shows He's Unwilling To Find Peaceful Solution: ISW
entries.description: Putin's remarks suggest he will not accept a resolution of the war other than on terms he dictates to Ukraine and the West, the U.S. think tank wrote.

entries.title: Joe Biden Will Absolutely Face Democratic Opposition in 2024, Huckabee Says
entries.description: "This is not the senior bowl," the former governor of Arkansas said. "This is the toughest job in the world."

entries.title: Lauren Boebert's Shooters Grill To Be Replaced by Mexican Restaurant
entries.description: Lauren Boebert's restaurant Shooters Grill, which served dishes named after firearms such as the 'M16 burrito,' shut in July.

entries.title: Ex-Russian Commander Credits Ukraine's Success to Kremlin's Sloppiness
entries.description: Russia's strikes on Ukrainian civilian infrastructure won't force them "to make peace," said prominent Russian military expert Igor Girkin.

entries.title: Joe Biden Outlines Why He Thinks 2023 Will Be a 'Great Year'
entries.description: One thing the president highlighted was that a monthly cap on the cost of insulin for diabetic patients on Medicare takes effect on January 1.

entries.description: The opening College Football Playoff National Championship Game odds favor the Georgia Bulldogs by 13.5 points over the TCU Horned Frogs.

entries.description: "You think you see [a shark] and it's gonna come up and eat you, but that's not true," photographer Euan Rannachan said.

entries.description: The 1994 animated classic from Disney tugged at all our heartstrings.

entries.title: The best bets to make for Week 17 in the NFL

entries.title: My Cousin Has Banned My Family From Seeing Our Sick Aunt—What Should I Do?

entries.description: Kohberger was arrested in connection with the killings of four University of Idaho students.
